author: Odeinoichus
title: Tis the Season
review:
Set #30186 Christmas Tree: LEGO Has given us a lot of different builds for holiday trees over the years, and each one prooves to be unique and fun in its own right. This Polybag from 2013 is pretty fun actually and here's why.

Pros

  • The build is relatively new to me, uses a lot of nice tricks to evoke the look of a Christmas Tree with lights and presents underneath it.
  • Transparent Green Starfish for the Tree topper is a nice looking piece in a unique colour.
  • Lot's of nice green and red pieces for festive MOCs.

Cons

  • None really to speak of.

Overall I think this is a really good looking mini-model that works great for the holidays. It has a very interesting build technique that works a lot better than the older Christmas Tree I picked up a few years ago, it's a much sturdier build. And the presents under the tree are pretty impressive looking, I'd recommend nabbing this set if possible.
